title: Boutique Hong Kong Glamour with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Free-Flow Drinks & Cathay Pacific Return Flights for Two
description:
Fall in love with one of Hong Kong's most exciting locales with an escape to the boutique Ovolo Central - a design-seeker's wonderland, inspired by the creative and cultural fabric of the Lan Kwai Fong & SoHo districts. Nestled amid a magnitude of high-end restaurants, sophisticated bars, world-renowned nightlife and the glittering harbour, this glamorous retreat puts you within walking distance of the area’s hot spots, with easy access to the city’s charming CBD. Experience a luxury stay where old-world touches, stunning design, and playful, art-filled interiors collide.

Savour a slice of vegetarian heaven at the onsite Veda restaurant and bar, rejuvenate your body and mind at the 24-hour fitness centre or immerse yourself in the famed nightlife of the vibrant city. Savour a complimentary non-alcoholic minibar and enjoy a daily free-flow drinks session, while self-service laundry facilities make your stay ultra-convenient.
offer_address: 2 Arbuthnot Road, Central Hong Kong 852, Hong Kong

title: Boutique Hong Kong Glamour with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drink & Two-Course Dinner Experience
description:
Fall in love with one of Hong Kong's most vibrant and artistic locales with an escape to this boutique design haven, where individually commissioned rock-and-roll artworks add a rebellious edge to its creative charm.

Inspired by the cultural pulse of the Lan Kwai Fong and SoHo districts, this stylish retreat is nestled amid high-end restaurants, sophisticated bars and the glittering harbour.

Step out and explore the area's hot spots or take a short stroll to the city's charming CBD. Indulge in plant-based Indian perfection at the onsite Veda restaurant and bar, revitalise at the 24-hour fitness centre or dive into Hong Kong’s legendary nearby nightlife.

With daily breakfast, nightly drinks and one two-course dinner experience, your stay promises ease and excitement in equal measure.
offer_address: 2 Arbuthnot Road, Central Hong Kong 852, Hong Kong
